description: Configuration for uni-api server connection. The URL is now auto-discovered from the uni-api container.
how_to_find_ip: Run: docker inspect uni-api --format '{{range .NetworkSettings.Networks}}{{.IPAddress}}{{end}}' to find the correct IP
setup_instructions: 2. Run the docker command above to start uni-api container
3. The system will automatically discover the container IP - no manual configuration needed!
